Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.kernel

Kernel functions.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
FooKernelFunction Provides an experimental KernelDistanceFunction for NumberVectors.
FooKernelFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
KernelMatrix Provides a class for storing the kernel matrix and several extraction methods for convenience.
LinearKernelFunction<O extends NumberVector<?,?>> Provides a linear Kernel function that computes a similarity between the two feature vectors V1 and V2 defined by V1^T*V2.
PolynomialKernelFunction Provides a polynomial Kernel function that computes a similarity between the two feature vectors V1 and V2 defined by (V1^T*V2)^degree.
PolynomialKernelFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.kernel Description

Kernel functions.
